parse.title: Undead (Slayer assignment)
parse.text:
Undead are a type of Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Dungeoneering
    • 2.3 Minigames
    • 2.4 Quest
  • 3 Update history

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign undead:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
The Raptor130-170None
Laniakea120-160None

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included see here for how to help out!
  • patch 24 April 2023 (Update):
    • The Edimmu room is now accessible with suitable Slayer Tasks such as ghost, zombie, undead, Creatures of Daemonheim, and Edimmu selected.
  • update 11 April 2023 (Update):
    • Updated Undead Slayer categories gamewide.
    • Monsters will more consistently appear in different Undead categories for the purposes of Slayer.
    • Some of the most notable:
      • Skeletal creatures such as Skeletal Wyverns are now treated as Undead, and will work for Skeleton and Undead tasks.
      • Creatures such as Banshees will work for Ghost and Undead Slayer tasks.
      • Edimmu will work for Ghost, Zombie and Undead Slayer tasks.
      • Added an Undead cluster task to Laniakea.
